info.author: Sanatan Halder
info.description:
Soft and Active Matter Physics(samp) module for Python
==========================================

**samp** is a Python module and its aim to provide simple and efficient
solutions for **Soft and Active Matter Physics research**. It gives facility 
like calculating mean sqaure displacement,velocity as well as it allows 
to save data in csv format. Alongside it is also capable of plotting 
mean square displacement,trajectory,time evolution of microscopic 
particles and also it can make a good animation.

See http://sanatanhalder.in/samp for complete documentation.

## Installation

```python
pip install samp
```

### Additional requirements
**samp** needs additional pyhton packages. See [requirements.txt](requirements.txt)
```python
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

#### Citing samp
If samp contributes to a project that leads to publication, please acknowledge this by citing samp.

[citation]()
